0001110010110000 0101011011111100 1 -> sum: 0111001110101101, cout: 0
0100000010111101 1010000000100111 1 -> sum: 1110000011100101, cout: 0
0001101101011100 1010101000000001 0 -> sum: 1100010101011101, cout: 0
1101011110110010 0110010010011100 1 -> sum: 0011110001001111, cout: 1
0000000000000000 0000000000000000 0 -> sum: 0000000000000000, cout: 0
1111111111111111 1111111111111111 1 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 1
0000000000000000 1111111111111111 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0
